title: Little teemo icon
body: From what is stated, I lose the icon if I leave during the match. Suppose I already completed a match of Doom Bots, and then I leave during the next match due to an emergency. Do I lose my icon entirely, despite fulfilling the requirements in getting the icon?

replies.body:
I believe leaving a match only prevents you from earning the icon for that *specific match* if you win. If you've already won another match without leaving, you should still earn the icon.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

If you win a game, you will have the icon.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
